verbose_text: Of note, the presence of LY294002, an inhibitor of PI3K / Akt, markedly inhibited the cardioprotective effect of Ang-(1-7) against HG triggered cytotoxicity, cell apoptosis, oxidative stress, mitochondrial damage and inflammatory reaction.
evidence: PI3K/Akt, markedly inhibited the cardioprotective effect of Ang-(1-7) against HG-triggered cytotoxicity, cell apoptosis
